about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hello! I'm Luciano Tonet, a web developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions. With solid experience in PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js, I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
about.description2: My journey in software development has led me to explore various technologies and frameworks, always with the goal of delivering high-quality products that solve real problems. Currently, I'm focused on integrating AI technologies into web applications, seeking to create more intelligent and personalized experiences.

latestPost.title: AI Agents with Laravel
latestPost.description: Exploring the creation of AI agents using Laravel and Groq
